backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping high-level product features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and global theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the hero header, guided chat flow container, and footer with social links.
frontend/src/config/pegasus.ts: Configuration for categories, WhatsApp details, catalogue info, and company metadata, plus a WhatsApp link helper.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/Catego: Interactive grid of category cards invoking a callback when a category is selected.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/ChatMe: Displays system and user messages with animated, styled chat bubbles.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/CTABut: Buttons for WhatsApp chat and catalogue download with premium-styled interactions.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/Guided: Main guided flow orchestrator rendering messages, quick replies, category cards, and CTAs based on step state.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/QuickR: Renders selectable quick reply buttons with optional descriptions for each choice.
TypeScript definitions for steps, messages, quick replies, answers, and guided flow state.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/useGui: Implements a multi-step guided flow with state management, message creation, answer handling, step navigation, and restart logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Simple wrapper hook exposing actor and fetch state for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a gold/white theme using CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project's premium branding.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, branding requirements, and overall project summary.
